scripts.lint: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.format: cargo fmt --all && cd frontend && npm run format
scripts.check: npm run frontend:check && npm run backend:check
scripts.dev:no-docker: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) npm run backend:dev:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch: SQLX_OFFLINE=true DISABLE_WORKTREE_ORPHAN_CLEANUP=1 RUST_LOG=debug cargo watch -w crates/server -w crates/db -w crates/services -w crates/executors -w crates/utils -w crates/deployment -w crates/local-deployment -x 'run -p server --bin server'
